headline: Itâ€™s Tough to Swipe Right While at Sea
abstract: If Tinder is about your first impression, working on a cruise ship is about your 15th impression, or 29th.
lead_paragraph: Among the many nicknames Erik had for me, my least favorite was Tinder. He had picked it not only because it rhymed with my last name, but also because, as he knew, I had done a lot of online dating before fleeing to take this job on a cruise ship.
